participant_2.background:
I check my grades before anything else.
I am working too much and not spending enough time with my family.
I am a wildlife photographer, and I wear cardigans to keep warm when I'm out in the field.
i own a chevy tahoe.
i can be quite forgetful.

content.text: Good! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well thanks! I'm about to head to work, so I'm just hanging out at home right now.
Oh fun, what do you do for work?
I'm a wildlife photographer, and I'm currently working on a project for the National Park Service.
That's so cool! I love nature photography.
Thanks! It's a lot of fun, but it can be pretty tough work too.
I bet! I can imagine having to hike all over the place and dealing with the elements.
Yeah, that's all part of the fun!
So what are you working on right now for the Park Service?
I'm actually working on a project about the endangered species in the park.
That's really important work! I'm sure it's rewarding.
It is! It's really nice to be able to help out and make a difference.
